data.text: Zonzisa, a Yave, bobo balembo nzonzisa.
simba nkaku wu fioti ayi wunneni
Bonga dionga difioti ayi dinneni ayi kaka nzila yi bobo balembo ndandakana
Bika batu babo bantombanga luzingu luama
bika baba banga mavevolo mamvevomono kuidi phemo
Bika nsolo awu wuba tombi ayi ndelo.
Bila bathambididi dikondi diawu mu kambu bila ;
Bika mbivusulu yi babuila mu kinzimbukila
Buna muelꞌama wela mona khini mu Yave
Buna nitu ama yimvimba yela yamikina :
Bambangi bakondolo kiadi zilembo telama ;
Bamvutudidi mambimbi mu mamboti.
Vayi bu baba mu kimbevo ; minu ndivuata tsaku35.13 Vuata tsaku voti vuata kaniki..
Ndibedi diatanga ku tsi kiadi
Minu bu ndibumina thutu,
Banga batu bobo bankinzikanga ko mambu ma Nzambi,
A Yave, nate thangu mbi wela kumatadidilanga e ?
Ndiela kuvutudila matondo mu lukutukunu lunneni ;
Kadi tala ti bamona khini mu diambu diama,
Bayolukilanga ndembama ko ;
Balembo nzibudila miunu
A Yave, ngeyo wumona mambu momo
kotuka ayi telama mu
Wundungisa boso buididi busonga buaku,
Kadi kuba bika bayindula :
Bika babo bammonanga khini mu ziphasi ziama,
Bika bobo bamonanga khini mu ndungunu ama
Buna ludimi luama luela yolukila busonga buaku ;
